403.title: 403 Forbidden
403.message: The server has refused to fulfill your request.

404.title: 404 Not Found
404.message: The document/file requested was not found on this server.

405.title: 405 Method Not Allowed
405.message: The method specified in the Request-Line is not allowed for the specified resource.

408.title: 408 Request Timeout
408.message: Your browser failed to send a request in the time allowed by the server.

500.title: 500 Internal Server Error
500.message: The request was unsuccessful due to an unexpected condition encountered by the server.

502.title: 502 Bad Gateway
502.message: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server while trying to fulfill the request.

503.title: 503 Service Unavailable
503.message: The server is not ready to handle the request.

504.title: 504 Gateway Timeout
504.message: The upstream server failed to send a request in the time allowed by the server.
